settings.text: Siluet is a Colombian brand with over 37 years in the shapewear industry whose foundation was built with four simple concepts of benefit, quality, value and charity. Founded in 1982, Siluet creates innovative specialty shapewear that appeals to everyday wear, postpartum, loose weight and post-surgical markets. Our Mission is to design and provide shapewear that combines the perfect blend of our exclusive Natural Latex, creating a "lipo-transportation" effect that contours the body, re-distributing and helping to eliminate fat, using the best quality materials and components at a price point offering an excellent value for the money.

settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.subtitle: Impressive
settings.title: Premium materials
settings.text: Siluet™ products are made only with premium materials that goes through a top-quality inspection process. Around 80% of our supplies are made within the factory: Natural Latex, some fabrics, hooks, rods and even glue for most of our garments are made specifically for Shapewear. This way we certify the quality and ergonomy of our products. Several technologies have been used in our factory to manufacture high quality Shapewear.

settings.title: What we love
settings.text: We do what we love ! We work with good practice policies. We have always believed that companies are sustainable, as long as they help meet the needs of their workers and their society. We believe that it is our responsibility to return through our business. We are a company that works with heart and, throughout the 37 years we have been in the market, this culture has helped us improve our productivity. Since 1982 Siluet™ has grown from a small room in a house, to a consolidated company, which thanks to an excellent team, a wide manufacturer plant and tech production, develops the best Colombian shapewear in the industry, while remaining committed to a social responsibility. Our staff is 90% young women that are usually head of a family and several children depend and rely on them. This way we offer a better quality of life to people that needs it. With several benefits above the average in Colombia, most of our staff has remained in our company for more than 18 years. We have a committed team of people that aims to make the best product available in the market.

settings.subtitle: Impressive
settings.title: Attention to detail
settings.text: Attention to detail is a key to success and many of our process involve also handmade products that require the skills of a group of talented craftsmen’s. Innovation, quality and attention to detail define Siluet Shapewear. We are constantly improving and looking forward to satisfying the needs of our customers worldwide.
